trans-unit.source: Scales and rotates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> supports only orthogonal transforms such as rotation transforms of 90° increments and scale transforms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> suporta somente ortogonais transformações como transformações de rotação de incrementos de 90 ° e transformações de escala.

trans-unit.source: Transforms that skew the image are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para as transformações que distorcer a imagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: As alterações de propriedade só podem ocorrer durante a inicialização do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> para sinalizar que a inicialização começou e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> para sinalizar que a inicialização foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Transform%29> constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> os objetos criados com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Transform%29> construtor são inicializados automaticamente e as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: Marcas de metadados relacionadas aos dados da imagem devem ser atualizadas se uma imagem é salvo em um arquivo depois de uma transformação é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> class.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> criado usando este construtor, você deve executar a inicialização de propriedade entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> chamadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> instance.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Transform" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> class that has the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Transform" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> os objetos criados com esse construtor são inicializados automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="newTransform" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The transform is not an orthogonal transform.
Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> initialization.
Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Inicialização de propriedade deve ser feita entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> chamadas.

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> tiver sido inicializado, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> com um conjunto de propriedades usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> is currently being initialized.
<see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit" /> has already been called.
-or-
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> has already been initialized.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> initialization.
Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Inicialização de propriedade deve ser feita entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> chamadas.

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> tiver sido inicializado, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> com um conjunto de propriedades usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Transform" /> properties are <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The transform is not an orthogonal transform.
-or-
The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit" /> method is called without first calling <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit" />.
Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
The source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that you want.
trans-unit.target: É possível encadear uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> para outro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> que você deseja.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-chain-bitmapsource-objects-together.md) for an example of chaining.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: cadeia BitmapSource objetos juntos](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-chain-bitmapsource-objects-together.md) para obter um exemplo de encadeamento.

trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />, which specifies the scale or rotation of the bitmap.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />, which specifies the scale or rotation of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />, que especifica a escala ou a rotação do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> supports only orthogonal transforms such as rotation transforms of 90 increments and scale transforms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> suporta somente ortogonais transformações como transformações de rotação de incrementos de 90 e transformações de escala.

trans-unit.source: Transforms that skew the image are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para as transformações que distorcer a imagem.

trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum
